name: Moriya Rootkit
description: Detects the use of Moriya rootkit as described in the securelist's Operation TunnelSnake report
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceName:ZzNetSvc)`
